name: artis_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kotak7.
Tool description: Api Musik Kotak7
API description: Fetches and returns album information for an artist based on the given parameters.

num.description: Number of albums to fetch information for.

lang.description: Language code for the response data.

index.description: Index position from which to start fetching the album data.

is_id.description: ID of the artist whose albums information is to be fetched.
